definition: A term referring to the act or process of receiving someone or something, typically used to describe the reception of guests, visitors, or signals. It commonly denotes the welcoming or acceptance of individuals or the reception of radio, television, or other electronic signals.

examples.german: Ich habe keinen Empfang auf meinem Handy.
examples.english: I have no reception on my phone.

examples.german: Der Empfang des Radiosenders ist schlecht.
examples.english: The reception of the radio station is poor.

examples.german: Sie arbeitet im Empfangsbereich des Hotels.
examples.english: She works in the reception area of the hotel.

examples.german: Der Empfang des Pakets wurde bestätigt.
examples.english: The receipt of the package was confirmed.
